name: Terror In The Atomic Desert
description: Terror In The Atomic desert is a first person horror puzzle game made as a homage to 1960s B-movies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 Bit) Processor: 2.9 GHz Dual-Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD Graphics or Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 Bit) Processor: 3.3 GHz Quad-Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon 6900 Or Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
